remarks: Characterizing property of the polynomial quotient.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
q1pval.q $e |- Q = ( quot1p ` R ) $.
q1pval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
q1pval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
q1pval.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
q1pval.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` P ) $.
q1pval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` P ) $.
q1peqb.c $e |- C = ( Unic1p ` R ) $.
q1peqb $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. C ) -> ( ( X e. B /\ ( D ` ( F .- ( X .x. G ) ) ) < ( D ` G ) ) <-> ( F Q G ) = X ) ) $.
